tool.name: gmt_music_plot_mutation-relation
tool.description: Makes plots for results from the mutation-relation tool.
tool.help:
**USAGE**
gmt music plot mutation-relation --input-matrix=? --output-pdf=? --genes-to-plot=?
**REQUIRED ARGUMENTS**
input-matrix A gene/sample matrix generated by the mutation-relation tool output-pdf An output pdf file to draw the plot to genes-to-plot Comma-separated list of genes to plot (example: DNMT3A,NPM1)
**DESCRIPTION**
Given a matrix generated using "music mutation-relation --mutation-matrix-file", this tool will create a plot that highlights mutual exclusivity or concurrence between the mutation status of a predefined set of genes.
